data.title: Welcome Home Maya
data.meta_description: Maya flies home as quickly as she can to warn her hive of the threatening attack of the hornets. Cassandra is overjoyed to have her pupil back, but atâ¦
data.text: S1 E52: Maya flies home as quickly as she can to warn her hive of the threatening attack of the hornets. Cassandra is overjoyed to have her pupil back, but at the same time she is very worried. The hornets are the worst enemies of the bees and a war against the hornets means greatest danger. But Maya's warning comes too late - the hornets invade the bee-hive.
